fields.Description/Abstract:
Sept. 2, 2016 – 
Feb. 5, 2017
Bellevue Arts Museum Biennial 2016: Metalmorphosis
(regional juried exhibition)
Bellevue Arts Museum, Bellevue, WA
Jurors: Lloyd E. Herman, Founding Director and Director Emeritus, Renwick Gallery, Smithsonian Institution; Jennifer Navva Milliken, Curator of Craft Bellevue Arts Museum; Suzanne Ramljak, Editor of Metalsmith magazine and curator at the American Federation of Arts, NY, NY; Cindi Strauss, Assistant Director, Programming and Curator for Modern and Contemporary Decorative Arts and Design, Museum of Fine Arts, Houston, TX
(49 applications selected from 330 applicants)
